section.p: You grab the woman’s wrist a split-second before she can cut the strings of your money pouch. You drag her around to face you, but she meets your outraged scowl with a swashbuckling grin.
‘You’ve got good reflexes,’ she says. ‘Most of the street scum around here are too drink-sodden or dimwitted to notice the loss of a few Shards. Want to earn some real money?’
